title: [GAMEPLAY]  Greater Vision Totem bug where it displays the Riot ward skin which I do not own.
body:
Fairly simple glitch, when I buy a Greater Vision Totem and place it displays a Riot ward skin instead of the SKT one that I own and have selected.  This only affects the vision totem and not the stealth totem.

1.  Reach lvl 9 and buy Greater Vision Totem and a normal Vision ward.
2.  Compare.

I have to give credit to AtomicAri for finding the bug.
Works 100% of the time.

Vison Ward:  http://gyazo.com/7d6e8cb981ffc66e9a941317c442ae63

Greater Vision Totem:  http://gyazo.com/65ccb374b7a3a16b5f8784c021fb4874

Thank you have a good day!

replies.body: Yeah, I had this happen, I put down the Great Vision totem and ended up with the Harrowing Tree. Honestly, I thought it was really cool. Take your time fixing this.
Thanks for the report! This is a known issue, and we're currently working on a fix!
Ya I get the snowman ward which I dont own and My friend she gets the haunted tree one
